title: Assistant Gossips About Doctor
summary: Staff overhears an assistant criticizing the doctor's competence. Correct gossip without humiliation; establish respect standards and understand root cause.

scene.setting: Staff overhears an assistant criticizing the doctor's competence. Morale drops; the manager feels a loyalty conflict. The hidden risk is toxic culture. The decision point is immediate discipline or reflective conversation.

beats.narration: The gossip is reported. The decision point is public reprimand or private, reflective conversation.

dialogue.speaker: mgr
dialogue.line: I need to talk with you privately. What was said has an impact; I also want to understand what's behind it.

choices.label: Reprimand the assistant publicly to set an example.

steps.step: Private follow-up: name impact, expectations, and one trust-building step.

leader_lines: Public wasn't the right place. Let's talk privately now.
questions: What are our team norms on respect?
scripts.closing_line: Expectations clear; one step to repair trust.

choices.label: Have a private conversation: name the impact and ask what's behind the comments.

steps.step: Private conversation: impact, then what's behind the comments.
Document one respect standard or team agreement (no gossip).

leader_lines: What you said has an impact. I also want to understand what's going on.
questions: How do we establish respect standards?
What would prevent this next time?

choices.label: Ignore it and hope the team moves on.

steps.step: Address as soon as reported: private conversation, clear expectations.

leader_lines: I should have addressed this sooner. Let's talk now.
questions: What are our norms on gossip?
How do we address without naming names in group?

choices.label: Move the assistant to a different area or role.

steps.step: Direct conversation first: impact, expectations, consequences.
Document; consider relocation only after behavior conversation.

leader_lines: Before any change in role, we need to address the behavior directly.
questions: What would need to change to stay in current role?
What support or coaching would help?

system_prompts.nudge: Understanding root cause can prevent recurrence.

outcomes.message: Fear and resentment may have grown. Trust is damaged.
reflection_questions: What would have changed with a reflective conversation?
How do you set standards without humiliation?

outcomes.message: Respect standards are set. Real concerns were heard; culture improved.
reflection_questions: Which single move established the standard?
How do you address gossip without naming names in group?

tsp.weekly_pulse_prompt: This week we addressed behavior without humiliation. (1-5)
